thread.title: BRAND-NEW 2-DAY SALE: JetBlue Fall Flights from $44+ O/W
thread.title_full: BRAND-NEW 2-DAY SALE: JetBlue Fall Flights from $44+ O/W

title: BRAND-NEW 2-DAY SALE: JetBlue Fall Flights from $44+ O/W
text:
BRAND-NEW 2-DAY SALE: JetBlue Fall Flights from $44+ O/W BRAND-NEW 2-DAY SALE: JetBlue Fall Flights from $44+ O/W July 14, 2015 9:12am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Fall flights are on sale with JetBlue starting as low as $44 each way. Book by 11:59 p.m. on July 15; and travel any day but Thursdays or Sundays between August 25 and November 18. Among the approximately 275 domestic and international routes on sale are flights to Ft. Lauderdale, Las Vegas, New York City, Kingston, and Medellin. 
Blackout dates prohibit travel to/from all destinations on October 12, and between November 4 and 9 to/from JFK, LGA, and EWR. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Applicable for travel most days of the week. Cons: Not much time to book. Verdict:
